Comments_List: I learnt how to speak italian very well and in general skills on advancing in a course.
I further improved my speaking capabilities and confidence in speaking.
Very good class. Reviewed basic sentence construction and grammatical components of Italian.
Memorization skills as well as better understanding of concepts learned last year.
I loved this course. I honestly would not change anything. It is structured so that keeping up with the work only furthers your learning and isn't just busy work.
A strength of this class is the intimacy of the student-teacher relationship. Everything was explained clearly.

Strength: you learn Italian 
Weakness: None
Definitley. Kyle is just the best.

Yes because the environment that the Italian department creates is very conducive to learning and fun. The style of class also allows you to get to know your classmates which is sometimes hard to do in big lectures.
